Comment: Here playing black with the queen gambit accepted (to decline is certainly better). One of my first blitz game, something like 5-6 months ago and one of my last queen gambit game! There are many inaccurate/weak moves but it still one of my favorite game I've done. I wanted to annotate it since a long time, so here we go!
